page.title: 10The Parsonage Museum(cont.)
page.content: much resentment,especially from older people in the village,that local opinion and benefit comes second to the needs of the tourists.An example of this is the plan to build a large new car park for local people at the bottom of the hill but they live at the top of a very steep hill where parking is reserved for tourists. Street parking is necessarily prohibited.Nobody loves the tourists. One small boy said,"I can't find anywhere to ride my bike." Jobs in industry have almost completely disappeared,causing the young people to move away from {Haworth}in search of employment,whilst strangers come and go.As one local said {- Once when you walked out you knew {everybody,now you don't even bother {looking.}
